"What I hope is that Kelsey Grammer and I can improve our communications and truly co-parent our two wonderful children," her statement said. She also wished her ex and his fiancee, Kayte Walsh, love and happiness in their new marriage. Kelsey Grammer , 55, told David Letterman on his show last month that he plans to marry Walsh sometime in February. The veteran actor starred in the comedy series "Cheers" and "Frasier."
